body.name: Dash Cam for Car Security Camera Front and Rear Vehicle Camera Dual DashCam Backup Camera, 3 Inch IPS Screen Video Recorder G-Sensor Night Vision Truck Camera

features: 【Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear】3-Inch dash cam front and rear in 1080p FHD resolution,Wide-angle front (170°) and waterproof rear（140°） cameras help eliminate the blind spots in your vision,providing reliable protection for your safe driving.

【G-sensor and Loop Recording】 The camera has built-in G-sensor, when the camera detects a collision or vibration, it will automatically lock the video being recorded,locked video will not be overwritten by loop recording. But the micro SD card is not included, you can buy 8-64GB micro SD card.

【Super Night Vision】The dashcam with super night vision and infrared cabin light uses f/2.0 wide aperture with a total of 6 layers of optical lens and WDR technology, coupled with 4 infrared lights, enabling the Bwertahy BW15 car camera to show good color accuracy and clearly capture important details day or night.

【3 Inch IPS Screen】This mini and compact dash cam won't obscure your view. The170°Wide angle can captures all three lanes of the road, no blind of spot. And the 3-inch HD screen is convenient to playback recordings with audio.
【SD Card not included】 Please note: the SD card is not included. You can buy 8-64GB class 10 micro SD card to record videos.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: G-Sensor and Video Lock Equipped with G-Sensor, when car occurs collision or vibration, it will automatically lock the video being recorded. And locked video will not be overwritten. You can playback the locked video to know the car accident.

Front Camera Installation Attach to the windshield with special 3M glue fixing bracket, run wire of car charger inside weatherstrip and headliners and then plug into the cigarette lighter socket. Rear Camera Installation Plug the rear camera into the AV port on the front camera tightly, carefully run the wire of rear cam and hide it under the trim. Mount it on the rear window inside the car (with double-sided adhesive pad) or above the number plate outside the car (with screws).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dash Cam for Enhanced Road Safety!
reviews.reviewText: the video quality is outstanding. The 1080p resolution captures crisp and clear footage, allowing me to easily identify license plates, road signs, and other important details. Whether it's daytime or nighttime, the camera adjusts seamlessly to different lighting conditions, delivering accurate and well-lit recordings.Installing the dash cam was a breeze. The package came with a mount that securely attaches to my windshield, ensuring stability even on bumpy roads. The cam itself is lightweight and doesn't obstruct my view while driving. Its discreet design blends seamlessly with the interior of my car, making it barely noticeable to passengers.One of the standout features of this dash cam is the wide-angle lens. It provides an impressive field of view, capturing everything happening in front of my vehicle. This has been particularly helpful in documenting incidents on the road, ensuring I have the evidence needed in case of an accident or dispute.the Dash Cam comes with a user-friendly interface. Navigating through the menu and adjusting settings is intuitive, and the included manual provides clear instructions for any customization needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and build
reviews.reviewText: I really like this dashcam. It blends in really well so you don’t even notice it. It take 64gb max which is really good compared to the other cameras that I have bought in the past. The video quality is really great and the loop recording is clutch. Overall, one of the best dash cams I’ve owned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks like a returned item
reviews.reviewText: Product looks so cheaply made , packaging was completely damaged. I just opened it and decided to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Front Dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I use this dash cam for recording in my car. It got the front and back camera. Meaning 2 camera. Easy to display especially the front camera. Camera quality and sound is good especially with the price. Worth it overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You get what you paid for
reviews.reviewText: The camara is just ok. But I had to buy extension wire for the rear camara because the wire was 2 plus feet shorter.3 days after the installation, the camara stopped working. So when I tested, the power cable got bad, so I had to buy extra power cable. The power cable that I got was almost as twice as thicker than the one that came with the camara.At the end, I could have got a much better camara with the same money that I invested in this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Received dashcam with front and rear cameras and big length wires which make easy to install. Its very convenient to setup and easy installation. Recommended to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dashcam I bought is an absolute game-changer. Its high-resolution recording captures every detail on the road, ensuring crystal-clear footage. The wide-angle lens provides excellent coverage, offering peace of mind while driving. Highly recommended for its impressive performance and reliability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad mount… and…
reviews.reviewText: Well… right away I can’t fit the window mount to the screen unit. Disappointing right away! No wring diagram either. So what’s up with the red wire for the rear camera ?Don’t bother buying…. ☹️
